about.title: About Us
about.description: School of Mathematics and Informatics A&B was established on April 1, 1998 in Shumen to support the extracurricular training of students from grades II to XII in mathematics, informatics, and information technologies.

achievements.title: Achievements
achievements.description: Students who study at the School of Mathematics and Informatics "A&B" traditionally take prize places in all competitions in which they participate.

meta.title: Our Teachers | A&B School
meta.description: Meet our exceptional team of experienced educators at A&B School of Mathematics and Informatics in Shumen, Bulgaria.

teachers.title: Our Teachers
teachers.subtitle: Meet our team of experienced and dedicated educators who inspire and guide our students to achieve their full potential.
